aircraft.value: Medusa Strike - AC-3897-921 at Regional Depot-B

defect_observed.value: Canopy seal deterioration. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Foreign object damage to critical surface

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fuselage Assembly component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications

preventive_action.value: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 06/09/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 08/09/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 07/09/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 12/09/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 16/09/2024 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao
